Articles.Content:
When I pause the game, the scene frames are still rendered for no(?) reason causing the same CPU load as while playing.

Is there a way (setting or mod) to make the game stop the rendering when paused (show a still image) to reduce the CPU load?

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-19T12:32:03Z" title="06/19/2015 12:32  PM" data-short="9 yr">June 19, 2015</time> by Teilnehmer**
I read about a mod that slows the frame rates drastically when the game is not focused, which should achieve what you want. I don't recall the name, but I saw it a few days ago in the mods sub-forum.
